snippet.title: Mini Worlds - Announcement Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3019950/Mini_Worlds

Mini Worlds is a cozy building game about creating tiny cities on a small world. Generate an near infinite number of worlds, create the tiny city of your dreams and enjoy the relaxing gameplay.

Social Media:
Bluesky ▶ https://bsky.app/profile/huntersonstudio.com
Discord ▶ https://discord.gg/UmUEbyw
Twitter ▶ https://twitter.com/HuntersonStudio

This announcement trailer from 2024 shows a glimpse of what's to come for Mini Worlds.
Hunterson Studio is the name for solo game developer Pieter Jagersma. (Casual Dutchman)

Heartwarming by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
